overview: In the format of a call-in talk show, four panelists relate some of the more debilitating personality traits that they were able to overcome through the application of past life therapy. Their experiences, portrayed through psychodrama allow the viewer the unique chance to glimpse the past life experience which formed the roots of the problem being related. It is also an opportunity to address common questions asked by those who are just becoming aware of past lives.
title: Cox Call-In Talk Show
